Case 1:10-cr-00330-AJ Document 142-1 Filed 02/06/13 Page 12 of 15
By signing this Addendum, Epstein asserts and certifies that the above has been read and explained to him. Epstein hereby states that he understands the clarifications to the Non-Prosecution Agreement and agrees to comply with them.
R. ALEXANDER ACOSTA
UNITED STATES ATTORNEY
Dated: 10/30/07
By: Jeffrey J. Sloman
A. MARIE VILLAPAÑA
ASSISTANT U.S. ATTORNEY
FAUSA
Dated: 10/29/07
JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: ____________________
GERALD LEFCOURT, ESQ.
COUNSEL TO JEFFREY EPSTEIN
Dated: ____________________
LILLY ANN SANCHEZ, ESQ.
ATTORNEY FOR JEFFREY EPSTEIN
DOJ-OGR-00002623

additional_notes: The document appears to be a court filing related to the case of Jeffrey Epstein. It includes signatures and dates from various individuals involved in the case, including attorneys and Epstein himself. The document is stamped with a DOJ reference number.
